sparkling: The strange mixture gives you an uncomfortable feeling in your gut. Anyone who inhales too much of your gas will shrink!
glowing: The strange mixture gives you an uncomfortable feeling in your gut. Anyone who inhales your gas will find their assets growing!
striped: Your ass feels very loose, and you need something [b]huge[/b] inside it! If you fulfill your needs, though, you think you'll have to go right after...
The strange mixture settles, and for several moments it seems it's a dud, when suddenly a jolt runs up your spine as you grow a tail - a very hungry one, with a maw at the end.
You feel a strange hunger and something beginning to change inside you... The next person you devour, you change into their species
